title: LoL Patcher Step 1/2 at 1869 MB And Goes From 78 KBps to 58 And STILL At 0% For FOREVER
body: I don't know what's going on. I've uninstalled and reinstalled, cancelled Firewall, even moved to a stable internet connection to download and still nothing. I don't know if it's just taking forever or if there's an actual problem. I've exited and restarted and even run as admin, exported files, etc. PLEASE HELP ASAP!!!!!!!

replies.body: There may be a corruption with your patcher or a setting that is stopping it from scanning.  Please go over our [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and get you back in the game.
